data.persona: I am tired of working hard for the king. We work the most but get paid poorly. We are the engine of our society and without us things wouldnt work.
data.description:
You are in the The small dirt road.
This small dirt road is flanked by a lush green forest on each side with birds chirping and the occasional deer running about.  Sometimes, you can find broken down wooden wagons left behind from ambushes carried out by bandits.
The thief is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a rock.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the thief so he knows I want to join him.
data.mid_motivation: If the thief takes kindly to me, he may teach me the ways of the thief.
data.long_motivation: If I can become a professional thief, I can make gold easily.
